hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Install for json data operations sudo apt-get --assume-yes install jq # Get the passed body information of post request from frontend for application metainfo
UNDEPLOYMENT_ANNOUNCE_RESPONSE=$(curl -X POST /las2peer/services/announceUndeployment -d "$BODY") UNDEPLOYMENT_ANNOUNCE_RESPONSE_CODE=$(echo $UNDEPLOYMENT_ANNOUNCE_RESPONSE | jq -r '.code') echo $UNDEPLOYMENT_ANNOUNCE_RESPONSE echo $UNDEPLOYMENT_ANNOUNCE_RESPONSE_CODE
